content:
It sounds like you're making great progress on your fitness journey! 

Congratulations on establishing a consistent yoga practice, and incorporating morning meditation sessions to help with stress and focus. That's a wonderful way to start your day.

It's also fantastic that you're getting back into jogging, and making the most of the good weather. Aiming for 3 miles, three times a week is a great goal, and I'm sure you'll be increasing your distance and frequency in no time.

Remember to listen to your body and pace yourself, especially as you're getting back into jogging. It's better to start slow and steady, and gradually increase your intensity and duration, rather than risking injury.

The park nearby your apartment is a great resource, and I'm sure the fresh air and scenic views are helping to make your jogging sessions more enjoyable.

Keep up the fantastic work, and don't hesitate to reach out if you need any more tips or motivation. You got this!
